r.s: ecma_intl is an i18n and l10n extension for PHP
r.d: ecma_intl is a PHP implementation of the ECMA-402 11th Edition Internationalization API Specification.
r.n: Fix: reduce duplication of code (and eliminate build warnings) by splitting MINIT for each class into separate functions. Fix: allow installation of extension on PHP 8.3. Fix: fixes a build warning for switch statements with no default branch.
